channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Maggie Rogers Shares New Dalai Lama Collab
item.description: 🎶 Exciting vibes alert! Maggie Rogers teams up with the Dalai Lama for a unique musical journey! 🌟 #MaggieRogers #DalaiLamaCollab

item.title: Hayley Williams Confirms Paramore Isn’t Breaking Up, Just Taking a Break
item.description: 🌟 Paramore fans, take a deep breath! 🌈 Hayley Williams assures us it's just a break, not a breakup. Let's keep the faith! 🎶 #ParamoreForever

item.title: The Get Up Kids’ Matt Pryor Announces New Album The Salton Sea: Hear The Title Track
item.description: 🎶 Jumping for joy because Matt Pryor is back with a new album! Dive into "The Salton Sea" title track now! 🌊 #NewMusicAlert #TheGetUpKids

item.title: Willie Nelson Announces 155th Album Willie Sings Merle, Unveils “Workin’ Man Blues”: Stream
item.description: 🎶 Willie Nelson keeping the music alive with new album "Willie Sings Merle"! 🎸 Let's rock to "Workin' Man Blues"! 🙌 #CountryMusicLegends #NewMusicAlert

item.title: The Weeknd Announces 2026 Tour Dates
item.description: 🎉 The Weeknd is hitting the road in 2026! 🚗 Which city will you be dancing in? 💃 #TheWeekndTour2026 🎶🔥
